name: bitsperbox-daemon
description: BitsperBox - Hardware bridge daemon for BitsperFoods restaurants

scripts.install:service: sudo cp systemd/bitsperbox.service /etc/systemd/system/ && sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl enable bitsperbox
scripts.uninstall:service: sudo systemctl stop bitsperbox && sudo systemctl disable bitsperbox && sudo rm /etc/systemd/system/bitsperbox.service

author: BitsperFoods
